import sys
def main():
	t = int(raw_input())
	for i in xrange(t) :
		s = int(raw_input())
		l = s + 1
		while True :
			k = str(l)
			if len(k) % 2 == 0 :
				check = False
				n = len(k)
				j = 0 ;
				while j <= n / 2 :
					if k[j] != k[n-1-j]:
						check = True
					j += 1 
				if check == True :
					l += 1
					continue
				else:
					print k
					break 
			else :
				check = False
				n = len(k) - 1 
				j = 0 ;
				while j <= n / 2 :
					if k[j] != k[n-j]:
						check = True
					j += 1 
				if check == True :
					l += 1
					continue
				else:
					print k
					break 
			l += 1


if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()
